resources.string: Sorry, the app has crashed.\n\n Please copy the content below and report this issue on github, remove any sensitive information before reporting.
Translations are done by Google AI, fire an issue on github for adding a new language support.

Permit if the call is repeated within a period of time, it is likely to be important rather than a spam call.

Receiving text message from the same number is also counted, this depends on whether the READ_SMS permission is granted, which is optional.

The default setting 1 / 5 Min means the second call within 5 minutes will be permitted.

Only applies for calls, not for text messages.

Priority: 10

The global switch, this app only works when this is turned on, turn it off when you are waiting for some particular call/message.

It can also be toggled from the Dropdown Quick Settings.

For SMS, this app will take over the SMS notifications, please turn off the notification permission of the default SMS app in system settings, otherwise there will be double notifications. It only filters SMS notifications, spam SMS messages will still be present in the default SMS app.
This app may not work correctly within work profile, please install it in main profile instead.
This app will take over all SMS notifications, but the notification permission of the default SMS app is also enabled, please disable it in system settings to prevent double SMS notifications.
